name: Crystal Vibes feat. Ott.
detailed_description:
Official selection of Sundance Film Festival New Frontier and Kaleidoscope Showcase Vol. 2, now available free!

Experience candy-colored psychedelic sound rippling through an endless crystal universe. Crystal Vibes is a VR music synesthesia demo that utilizes the cutting edge of spatial 3D audio and sound visualization that maps sound and light based on the science of the human senses, to push the frontiers of technology-mediated sensory experience in virtual reality. With the project's predecessor described as “transcendent” and “like traveling through a psychedelic kaleidoscope” (Forbes 2016), this piece ups the ante with music from producer Ott.

This demo was produced as ongoing research into the possibilities for multi-crossed-sensory virtual reality experience, originally designed to also integrate with the "Synesthesia Suit" for a whole-body vibrotactile haptic experience. It was presented along with Rez Infinite at Sundance Film Festival New Frontier 2017. See the website for more exciting details and to catch up on the latest research.
